cs213.photoAlbum.control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cs213.photoAlbum.control.ControlInterface

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements cs213.photoAlbum.control.ControlInterface
    Controller class. Responsible for all the nitty-gritty in the Photo Album application. Performs all data and logic related operations.
    Since:
    01-20-2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amar Bakir

        public int addPhoto(java.lang.String filename,
                    java.lang.String caption,
                    java.lang.String albumName,
                    java.io.File pic)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a photo to the chosen album.
        Specified by:
        addPhoto in interface cs213.photoAlbum.control.ControlInterface
        Parameters:
        filename - is the name of the photo
        caption - is the caption to add to the photo
        albumName - is the album to add the photo to
        pic - is the pictures File object
        Returns:
        1 = Success -1 = Photo already exists in the album -2 = Album doesn't exists -3 = File does not exist
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • movePhoto

        public int movePhoto(java.lang.String photoName,
                     java.lang.String oldAlbum,
                     java.lang.String newAlbum)
        Description copied from interface: cs213.photoAlbum.control.ControlInterface
        Moves a photo from one album to the other. If it already exists in the new Album the method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        movePhoto in interface cs213.photoAlbum.control.ControlInterface
        Parameters:
        photoName - is the target photo name
        oldAlbum - is the old Album name (Album to move from)
        newAlbum - is the new Album name (Album to move to)
        Returns:
        1 = Success -1 = Invalid old album -2 = Invalid new album -3 = Photo already exists in the new album -4 = Photo doesn't exist in the old album

        Parameters:
        fileName - is the name of the photo
        albumName - is the Album the photo is in
        Returns:
        1 = Success -1 = Album doesn't exist -2 = Photo doesn't exist
